titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Highness the Lord Protector, inviting the people of England and Wales, to a day of solemn fasting and humiliation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by his Highness special commandment, by Henry Hills and William du-Gard, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall this 20. of March 1653 [i.e. 1654].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
